stepAnswer: Translate left by $$2$$\nStretch vertically by $$3$$\nTranslate down by $$5$$
stepTitle: Give a sequence of three basic transformations whose composition transforms the graph of $$y=x^2$$ into $$y=f(x)$$.
answerLatex: Translate left by $$2$$\nStretch vertically by $$3$$\nTranslate down by $$5$$
choices: Translate left by $$2$$\nStretch vertically by $$3$$\nTranslate down by $$5$$
Translate right by $$2$$\nStretch vertically by $$3$$\nTranslate up by $$7$$
Translate left by $$4$$\nCompress vertically by $$3$$\nTranslate up by $$5$$
Translate right by $$4$$\nCompress vertically by $$3$$\nTranslate down by $$7$$
